title: A bug or ??? Please help !!!
body:
Guys please help me... Today i played 3 matches of lol... after i exited it i turned off my pc and went outside. Now I turned back and i have a huge bug or idk what... I deleted the league, reinstalled it but nothing so let me explains what happens. And if you know please help me . {{item:3070}}  So the first thing its this:
1. I start the league client lol.launcher ; lol.launcher.admin ; LeagueClient. -> it brings me up this: https://gyazo.com/1d5ea7ec4965458877b1320525279a95 
2. I hit launch, this appears https://gyazo.com/354b81d2647916f916767cf979876f44 ( sorry for that you can see how i still work on this board xd )
3. I wait 10-30 secs and after this the .png image dissapears... and the client to write my ID and PASS don't appear... idk why...
P.S: As i said, i already tried to unninstall and reinstall it, to run it from all 3 clients , but nothing so if you guys know what happened and why please let me know... Today i played 3 matches and it worked perfectly but when i came home it didn't started anymore...
HELP PLS  {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Thanks for the detailed report on the issue, and I'd like to help!   Your client not appearing after hitting launch may be due to a setting on your OS that's blocking it from loading.  Restart your pc and try it again in case it crashed in the background.  Otherwise, run through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that your settings are allowing league as an exception.  Let me know if that helps and dries those tears!
I restarted and still don't work, i updated windows and now it works!!! ty very much
